wikipedia_page.main: Alison Lambert (born October 1957 in U.K) is a British clarinettist.

response: Meyer was professor of clarinet at the Musikhochschule Karlsruhe from 1989 until 2016, serving as its director from 2001 to 2007. Among his students were Alexander Bader and Alison Lambert. He led masterclasses in Brazil, Canada, Finland, Italy and Japan.
